we are seeking a

CO-OP SOFTWARE DEVELOPER

WE BUILD SOLUTIONS THAT HELP SAVE LIVES

Zetron, a Codan company, is a trusted provider of communication products and solutions that help our customers protect, inform, and save lives. Whether they are conducting a search and rescue, containing a fire, maintaining safety, or providing security at a profile event, Zetron makes sure the customer can be heard over the mountain, throughout the city, or across the globe. We invite you to join our mission at our Canadian Head Office located near beautiful downtown Victoria in the newly restored Press Building with modern office space built for collaboration!



THE ROLE:

This is a minimum 4-month co-op based in Victoria, BC, with the strong likelihood for extension to 8 months.

At Zetron, we hire co-op students not only because we want to invest in developers, but also because it is an investment in our business. Did you know that 40% of our Engineering staff are UVic alumni?

We are recruiting for a Co-op Software Developer who can join our Agile team of Software Engineers as they develop the next generation of Zetron radio systems. We develop our radio systems entirely in-house, including the hardware, firmware, software, and user interface. Our software stack consists primarily of C and C++ running on an embedded Linux platform. We also develop applications with Java, C#, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and .NET Framework and automated tests with PyTest (Python).

As a Zetron staff member, you won't be tasked with an isolated project. We will train you to be a fully functioning member of our Software team, participating in full-cycle Agile development. Throughout the course of your co-op term, you will:

Work in an Agile/Scrum environment.
Write production code on large development project for use in mission critical systems.
Learn Domain Driven Design and Message Bus Architecture.
Learn advanced techniques in concurrent programming.
Learn real-time programming techniques in a resource constrained environment.

ABOUT YOU:

We are looking for an ambitious co-op student, excited to take part in all aspects of the software development cycle who:

Has a strong knowledge of embedded and object-oriented programming.
Is familiar with software development tools (IDE, source control, unit and automated testing).
Uses strong communication and collaboration skills.
Loves to identify and resolve problems.
Has proven organizational, time management and prioritizing skills.
Is eager to learn, grow, and be challenged by experienced developers.

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS:

Applications can be submitted to: mailto:Jennifer.Beasley@zetron.com

Please include resume, cover letter, and transcript without any links (plain text is fine) to any websites

in your application package. Only successful applicants will be contacted for interviews. Thank you!
